nodes.text: Quell was a planet located in the far reaches of the Quell system in the Outer Rim Territories. When viewed from space, the world's surface was cerulean in color and covered almost entirely by white clouds. During the Clone Wars in 21 BBY, a galactic conflict fought between the Galactic Republic and the Confederacy of Independent Systems, the Battle of Quell took place in the world's upper atmosphere, resulting in wreckage from both sides of the struggle plummeting towards the planet's surface.

Quell first appeared in "Jedi Crash," the thirteenth episode of the animated series Star Wars: The Clone Wars' first season, which originally aired on January 16, 2009. The episode's script described the Battle of Quell as being fought in space, but it was moved to the planet's upper atmosphere for dramatic effect as the show entered pre-production. The planet was first identified in the episode guide for "Jedi Crash" on StarWars.com.
